description: Get happy? No! Get Kranky! Another hand-crafted, fun-filled font guaranteed to put a smile on your face. So grab it now and put on a big old I-got-it-for-free grin. But before your face gets stuck like that be sure to check out all the other inappropriately named fonts by Squid.
